name: Robot Ragtime
description:
3D Platformer Project for the Michigan State University Specialization in Game Design and Development. 

Modifications done over the base project:

  • Design of one complete new level
  • Creation of a new music track (Level Theme)
  • Implemented a new power-up : the blue speed pill (Level2). Upgrade or downgrade? That's for you to tell...
  • Added a boss and implemented his behaviour to unlock the end of the level

Created by Vladimir "Kyoomei" Romero

Level music by Vladimir "Kyoomei" Romero

Base code and assets provided by Michigan State University
